document.full_text: women who down a lot of caffeinated drinks each day may have a slightly increased risk of developing urinary incontinence, a new study suggests. the results add to conflicting evidence on whether caffeine worsens a common condition.
document.title: very high caffeine intake linked to leaky bladder
lines_and_colors: women who down a lot of caffeinated drinks each day may have a slightly increased risk of developing urinary incontinence, a new study suggests. the results add to conflicting evidence on whether caffeine worsens a common condition.
